name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Louis Alexander JOHNSON a/k/a Lewis Johnson, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
